short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Twitter like, retweet, follower and reply counts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension aims to provide a healthier online experience on Twitter by allowing you to hide metrics such as like, reply, follower and re-tweet counts.

Click the extension icon next to your address bar to access the preferences menu. From here, you can enable or disable the hiding of each metric.
